attributes.action: Reduce overseas aid, increase UK old age pensions
attributes.additional_details:
The Old Age Pension in the UK should only be available to those who have paid for it and it should not be subsidised by the tax payer, i.e. by Pension Credits to and for those that have not paid.
To fund this Old Age Pension increase, overseas aid, which only rarely reaches those for whom it is given, as it is stolen/misappropriated by those who manage it, should be used to help improve the lives of UK Pensioners.
